name: Identifying the numbers a fraction falls between

skills.name: Identify the two whole numbers a fraction lies between

explanations.A: Not all fractions need to be less than 1. 3/2 means we have three halves. Can you count along the number line in halves to see which letter you get to?
explanations.B: 3/2 means 3 x 1/2 which is 1.5. This is represented by the letter B!
explanations.C: The fraction has 2 and 3 in it but that doesn't mean the letter between 2 and 3 represents it. 3/2 means 3 x 1/2. Can you count along the number line in halves until you get to 3/2?
explanations.D: I think you are thinking of 3 and 1/2 not 3/2 which is 3 x 1/2.

explanations.A: Not all fractions need to be less than 1. 5/2 means we have five halves. Can you count along the number line in halves to see which letter you get to?
explanations.B: This would be 3/2 as that equals 1.5. Can you work out the value of 5/2?
explanations.C: 5/2 means 5 x 1/2 which is 2.5. This is represented by the letter C!
explanations.D: I think you are thinking of 5 and 1/2 not 5/2 which is 5 x 1/2

explanations.A: I think you have just looked at the numerator, but to get our answer, we need to work out how many 4s are in 9 as the fraction is 9/4!
explanations.B: 9/4 = 2 remainder 1 and 1/4 = .25, so 9/4 = 2.25 therefore, it lies between 2 and 3!
explanations.C: Double check your calculation... The fraction is 9/4 so we need to work out how many 4s are in 9 to get our answer!
explanations.D: I think you have done 4/9, but the fraction is 9/4... How many 4s are in 9?

explanations.A: I think you have done 4/19, but the fraction is 19/4... How many 4s are in 19?
explanations.B: Double check your calculation... The fraction is 19/4 so we need to work out how many 4s are in 19 to get our answer!
explanations.C: I think you have found the difference between the numerator and the denominator but 19/4 means 19 รท 4 so you need to find out how many 4s are in 19 to get your answer!
explanations.D: 19/4 = 4 remainder 3, and 3/4 = .75, so 19/4 = 4.75 therefore, it lies between 4 and 5!

explanations.A: I think you have just looked at the numerator, but to get our answer, we need to work out how many 5s are in 38 as the fraction is 38/5!
explanations.B: Double check your calculation... The fraction is 38/5 so we need to work out how many 5s are in 38 to get our answer!
explanations.C: 38/5 = 7 remainder 3, and 3/5 = .6, so 38/5 = 7.6 therefore, it lies between 7 and 8!
explanations.D: Not all fractions are less than 1. Improper fractions are always greater than 1! The fraction is 38/5, so we need to work out how many 5s are in 38 to get the answer.

explanations.A: 27/5 = 5 remainder 2, and 2/5 = .4, so 27/5 = 5.4 therefore, it lies between 5 and 6!
explanations.B: Not all fractions are less than 1. Improper fractions are always greater than 1! The fraction is 27/5 so we need to work out how many 5s are in 27 to get the answer
explanations.C: Double check your calculation... The fraction is 27/5 so we need to work out how many 5s are in 27 to get our answer!
explanations.D: I think you have just looked at the numerator, but to get our answer, we need to work out how many 5s are in 27 as the fraction is 27/5!

explanations.A: Close! 100 x 6 = 600 and 101 x 6 = 606. If it was between 100 and 101 the numerator would be between 600 and 606 but it's 609...
explanations.B: I think you have confused the place value. Don't lose the 0 when you are dividing. The fraction is 609/6 so you need to work out how many 6s are in 609 to get the answer!
explanations.C: 101 x 6 = 606 and 102 x 6 = 612 therefore, the fraction lies between 101 and 102!
explanations.D: I think you have just looked at the numerator, but to get our answer, we need to work out how many 6s are in 609 as the fraction is 609/6!

explanations.A: I think you have just looked at the numerator, but to get our answer, we need to work out how many 7s are in 708 as the fraction is 708/7!
explanations.B: 101 x 7 = 707 and 102 x 7 = 714 therefore, the fraction lies between 101 and 102!
explanations.C: Close! 100 x 7 = 700 and 101 x 7 = 707. If it was between 100 and 101 the numerator would be between 700 and 707 but it's 708...
explanations.D: I think you have confused the place value. Don't lose the 0 when you are dividing. The fraction is 708/7 so you need to work out how many 7s are in 708 to get the answer!

explanations.A: 240/10 = 24, but the star lies below 24. Work out the value of the other fractions to see which one would give you a value below 24!
explanations.B: I think you have divided the wrong way round! You have worked out the value of 214/9 but the fraction is 9/214
explanations.C: I think you have just looked at the numerator, but to get our answer, we need to work out the value of each fraction by doing the divisions!

explanations.A: I think you have divided the wrong way round! You have worked out the value of 286/9 but the fraction is 9/286
explanations.B: I think you have just looked at the numerator, but to get our answer, we need to work out the value of each fraction by doing the divisions!
explanations.D: 320/10 = 32, but the star lies below 32. Work out the value of the other fractions to see which one would give you a value below 32!
